resources.string: As you may have noticed the recent GNL update broke all functionality of XGELS. This is due to the complete obfuscation of the GNL apk. To make XGELS work again I had to reverse engineer each feature of XGELS and basically had to go through all my and even the GNL source code again. Luckily I was able to restore 99% of the features!

It is assumed that Google obfuscates GNL with every major release (3.X) again, meaning that XGELS will break most likely. But this time I\'m prepared and I\'m certain I can restore the same functionality within a few hours!

If you don\'t want GNL/Google Search to break XGELS you can go to the Google Play Store and disable automatic updates. GNL/Google Search uses staged rollouts, which means in some cases XGELS gets updated before you even receive the official GNL/Google Search update. You can click here to open the Play Store and disable the automatic update right now!

Due to the reverse engineering there might still be a few bugs here and there. Please be a little bit more forgiving, don\'t ruin my Play Store rating with bug reports. Use the \"Send bug report\" function in the settings menu. Thank you!
It\'s an incredible amount of work for me to maintain XGELS and give good support to you guys. If you feel like donating to me, click here! (!This won\'t unlock Premium!)
Show your support and leave me a rating on Google Play. A good reputation will motivate others to try XGELS, too. Click here to rate XGELS on Google Play!
